name: Pacman-Retro
description:
Enjoy everyone’s favorite classic arcade game PAC-MAN in this expertly crafted remake Pacman-Retro!  This game is ad free!

Earn high scores as you eat fruit and run away from the Ghosts: Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde.

Gobble a Power Pellet and get the Ghosts before they get you!

Pacman-Retro is the retro arcade remake of the game you know and love!

CLASSIC ARCADE ACTION

  • The retro arcade classic version that feels just like it did in the arcades
  • Old school challenge, with no quarters and no lines
  • Avoid the ghosts and eat the fruit and dots, just like in the arcade

Discover the retro classic all over again! Bring the old school arcade action of Pacman-Retro to your PC, or your laptop and take it where ever you go!

Use the arrow keys to move Pacman around the board.
